attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is a disgrace that Members of parliament have the chance to vote for a payrise every year. For the amount of work that they do should reflect in the salaries they receive.
MPs earn over £60,000 per year for running this country which in all honesty, is going down the pan.
The average British citizen earns under £15,000 per year, working all the hours god sends. So why should MPs earn this much for sitting around the house of commons and deciding what is best for us.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
